welcome_message_body: Welcome to Akita, a city known for its beautiful cherry blossoms, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: 末廣ラーメン本舗秋田山王本店

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Akita Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
